meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Guatemala, equal to 100 centavos.
meanings.sent1: In Guatemala, you can buy many things with just a few quetzals.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for quetzals at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The quetzals in my pocket jingled as I walked, making me feel rich.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a handful of shiny quetzals.
meanings.sent5: The colorful quetzals in the market caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: A Central American bird with iridescent green plumage and a long tail.
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of quetzals flying gracefully in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The quetzals' feathers shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the quetzals' elegant flight.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was compared to the majestic quetzals of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The rare sighting of quetzals made the nature hike unforgettable.
